channel.title: Need help picking a good source
channel.description:
I am currently running a 508 as my main source, it is more "Skilling" than it is "Pvp".
People on my server say the reason I am not holding a couple hundred players is because people like to "PVP" more than they like to "Skill".
So my question is going to branch out further in the community by coming here and asking what everyone else things about the player ratio from "PVP" to "Skiller"?
Thanks :)

item.title: Need help picking a good source
item.dc:creator: @Skilled_Moms Skilled Moms
item.description:
@Skilled_Moms wrote:

Well sophia u may beat me in ccoding but i beat u in source choice… i think =[] if you want total pvp with some skilling there is an old server “PvP Angel” its base would be perfect for what your looking for its base was atomic pkz i think but its spawn but i also know u wuld code it different and the other thing is this is a 317. =\

Read full topic
item.source: Need help picking a good source
